summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.1°C) and outside temperature (down 2.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1419 m), feels like temperature (up 6.1°C), and outside temperature (up 4.3°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 745m and a peak of 3580m, averaging 1267.0m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Drizzle or light rain possible, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dim outside. Weather could become unsettled.
